Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.name: immediately
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.abstract: Sets minimum font size immediately when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.name: smoothly
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.abstract: Sets minimum font size step by step during animation transition when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.name: MinimizationAnimationType
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField/Minimiz.abstract: Animation type when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: minimumPlaceholderFontSize
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: Minimum font size for the custom placeholder.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: originalPlaceholderFontSize
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: Original (maximum) font size for the custom placeholder.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.name: attributedTweePlaceholder
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.abstract: The styled string for a custom placeholder.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: tweePlaceholder
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: The string that is displayed when there is no other text in the text field.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.name: placeholderInsets
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.abstract: The custom insets for placeholderLabel relative to the text field.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.name: placeholderLabel
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/s.abstract: Custom placeholder label. You can use it to style placeholder text.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: text
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: The current text that is displayed by the label.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: attributedText
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: The styled text displayed by the text field.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: textAlignment
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: The technique to use for aligning the text.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.name: font
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html#/c.abstract: The font used to display the text.

Classes/TweeBorderedTextField.html#/s:13.name: borderOffset
Classes/TweeBorderedTextField.html#/s:13.abstract: Specifies offset for the bottom line based on default border coordinates.

Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/s:.name: infoLabel
Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/s:.abstract: Info label that is shown for a user. This label will appear under the text field.

Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.name: infoAnimationDuration
Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.abstract: Animation duration for showing and hiding the info label.

Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.name: infoFontSize
Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.abstract: Font size of info text. If you want to change font use infoLabel property.

Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.name: hideInfo(animated:)
Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html#/c:.abstract: Hides the info label with animation or not.

Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.name: activeLineColor
Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.abstract: Color of line that appears when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.name: activeLineWidth
Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.abstract: Width of line that appears when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.name: animationDuration
Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html#/c:@M@T.abstract: Width of line that appears when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html.name: TweeActiveTextField
Classes/TweeActiveTextField.html.abstract: An object of the class can show animated bottom line when a user begins editing.

Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html.name: TweeAttributedTextField
Classes/TweeAttributedTextField.html.abstract: An object of the class can show the custom info label under text field.

Classes/TweeBorderedTextField.html.name: TweeBorderedTextField
Classes/TweeBorderedTextField.html.abstract: An object of the class can show bottom line permanently.

Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html.name: TweePlaceholderTextField
Classes/TweePlaceholderTextField.html.abstract: An object of the class has a customized placeholder label which has animations on the beginning and ending editing.
